Special envoy of U.N. Secretary General and his party here
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Moris Strong, special envoy of the U.N. Secretary General and his party arrived here today.
 They were met at the airport by an official concerned and the U.N. resident coordinator and the resident representative of the UNDP.
